plot outline: The movie is a comedy drama about two friends who fall in love one with a Muslim, and the other with a Hindu girl. However, confusion ensues when one of the duo, who had fallen in love with a Hindu girl, realises on wedding day that his bride-to-be is a Muslim, and vice versa. The chaos and comedy of errors that takes place forms the crux of the film.
title: Alya Have Shu?
